TEXT.line: Thought you might need a hand there.
How did you end up in such danger anyway?
I am on a mission for Rahaga Norik. We have to find the six Makoki stones.
They will lead us to the Mask of Light.
Go quickly to Po-Metru and find the second Makoki stone.
Of course, Vakama; I will meet with you and the others once I have the stone.
